string-array.name: horoscope_array
string-array.item: Aries: March 21 - April 19. Aries individuals are known for their energetic, dynamic, and pioneering nature. They are confident, enthusiastic, and assertive. Famous Aries: Leonardo da Vinci.

Taurus: April 20 - May 20. Taurus individuals are known for their reliability, patience, and practical approach to life. They value stability and have a strong work ethic. Famous Taurus: Queen Elizabeth II.
Gemini: May 21 - June 20. Geminis are known for their versatility, curiosity, and sociability. They are quick-witted, adaptable, and communicative. Famous Gemini: John F. Kennedy.
Cancer: June 21 - July 22. Cancer individuals are known for their emotional depth, intuition, and nurturing nature. They value family and home life highly. Famous Cancer: Princess Diana.
Leo: July 23 - August 22. Leos are known for their confidence, creativity, and leadership. They are charismatic, generous, and enjoy being in the spotlight. Famous Leo: Barack Obama.
Virgo: August 23 - September 22. Virgos are known for their analytical minds, attention to detail, and practicality. They are organized and reliable. Famous Virgo: Mother Teresa.
Libra: September 23 - October 22. Libras are known for their balance, harmony, and justice. They are diplomatic, charming, and socially skilled. Famous Libra: Mahatma Gandhi.
Scorpio: October 23 - November 21. Scorpios are known for their intensity, passion, and determination. They are resourceful and focused. Famous Scorpio: Marie Curie.
Sagittarius: November 22 - December 21. Sagittarians are known for their adventurous spirit, optimism, and love of freedom. They are philosophical and open-minded. Famous Sagittarius: Mark Twain.
Capricorn: December 22 - January 19. Capricorns are known for their ambition, discipline, and practicality. They are hardworking and goal-oriented. Famous Capricorn: Martin Luther King Jr.
Aquarius: January 20 - February 18. Aquarians are known for their innovation, independence, and humanitarianism. They are intellectual and forward-thinking. Famous Aquarius: Abraham Lincoln.
Pisces: February 19 - March 20. Pisces individuals are known for their empathy, intuition, and artistic nature. They are compassionate and dreamy. Famous Pisces: Albert Einstein.
